ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a large bowl combine the beef, eggs, crumbs, ketchup, MSG, water and soup mix. Mix well and spoon mixture into loaf pan. Cover with 2 strips of bacon, then cover with tomato sauce.
Bake in preheated oven for 1 hour.
title: Ann's Sister's Meatloaf Recipe
sentences: In a large bowl combine the beef, eggs, crumbs, ketchup, MSG, water and soup mix.
Mix well and spoon mixture into loaf pan.
Cover with 2 strips of bacon, then cover with tomato sauce.
Bake in preheated oven for 1 hour.
